articles.title: Boy Demands Apple Reform 'Offensive, Insulting' Nerd Face Emoji
articles.description: A ten-year-old boy from England has called upon the tech empire Apple to reform its "nerd face" emoji, arguing that it offensively represents those who wear glasses.
articles.content:
